title: EASY MATH
text:
You will be given 4 numbers: n m a d.Find count of numbers between n and m (inclusive) not divisible by (a) or (a+d) or (a+2d) or (a+3d) or (a+4d).InputFirst line has number t - number of test cases.Each test case has 4 numbers n m a d.OutputSingle line having single number giving the count.Constraints1 ≤ n ≤ m ≤ 2321 ≤ a ≤ 2321 ≤ d ≤ 2322 ≤ t ≤ 100ExampleInput:3
1 10 2 2
20 100 3 3
100 1000 4 5Output:5
54
543Also try the challenge version atEASYMATC
